conversations.content: How many appointments do I have today?

<function_thought>
To determine how many appointments Emma has today, I will first retrieve the current day using the `get_current_day` function. Once I have the current day, I can then fetch the appointments for that day using the `get_day_calendar_events` function.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_current_day()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
I have retrieved the current day, which is 2024-05-15. Now, I will use this information to fetch the appointments for today by calling the `get_day_calendar_events` function with the current date.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_day_calendar_events(day="2024-05-15")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
